com.aheaditec.wrapper.interfaces

Interface ReaderConnectionManager


  • public interface ReaderConnectionManager

    Every reader type should implement this interface so they have unified API. This interface contains basic methods like scanning for paired devices, connect to specific reader and others.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectReader(com.aheaditec.wrapper.Reader reader, ReaderStatusListener readerStatus)
      Method stops scanning for paired devices and tries to connect to specified reader.
      java.util.List<com.aheaditec.wrapper.Reader> getAvailableReaderList()
      Method returns list of already found devices.
      java.util.List<com.aheaditec.wrapper.Reader> getPairedDevices()
      Method returns list of paired readers in device.
      CardReader getReader()
      Deprecated. 
      void release()
      Method used to release all necessary components.
      void startScanningForPairedDevice(OnPairedReaderFoundListener listener)
      Starts scanning for paired devices.
      void stopScanningForPairedDevice()
      Stop scanning process.

    • Method Detail

      • startScanningForPairedDevice

        void startScanningForPairedDevice(@NonNull
                                  OnPairedReaderFoundListener listener)
        Starts scanning for paired devices.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener returning results of the call.

      • stopScanningForPairedDevice

        void stopScanningForPairedDevice()
        Stop scanning process.

      • connectReader

        void connectReader(@NonNull
                   com.aheaditec.wrapper.Reader reader,
                   @NonNull
                   ReaderStatusListener readerStatus)
        Method stops scanning for paired devices and tries to connect to specified reader.
        Parameters:
        reader - Reader to which we want to connect.
        readerStatus - Listener returning states of reader (connected, disconnected, not found).

      • getReader

        @Deprecated
 @Nullable
CardReader getReader()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns implementation of CardReader interface. May by null, if device is not connected to any reader.
        Returns:
        Implementation of reader interface.

      • release

        void release()
        Method used to release all necessary components.

      • getAvailableReaderList

        @NonNull
java.util.List<com.aheaditec.wrapper.Reader> getAvailableReaderList()
        Method returns list of already found devices. Only works after startScanning call, devices may no longer be visible!
        Returns:
        List of already scanned devices.

      • getPairedDevices

        @NonNull
java.util.List<com.aheaditec.wrapper.Reader> getPairedDevices()
        Method returns list of paired readers in device.
        Returns:
        List of paired devices.
